name: Ever 17
nutshell:
A promised past and returning where one belongs.
The underwater theme park, LeMU. Takeshi Kuranari, one of the park guests, is suddenly involved in a freak accident. And he finds himself stuck in LeMU with a number of other survivors. Because of the system's failure, the water pressure will slowly crush the facility. The time limit till implosion is 170 hours and 17 minutes. Will they be able to escape to the surface!?
This webcomic is based on the visual novel Ever17 ~ the out of infinity.
Wikipedia

name: Saikyou no Kanteishi tte Dare no koto? ~Manpuku gohan de Isekai Seikatsu~
nutshell:
Yuri Kugimiya is a high school student who has suddenly been transported to another world. As soon as he arrived, he got lost in a dungeon and was then helped by a troop of adventurers. He then discovers that he now has something more: "the Eye of God", one of the strongest skills in this world that allows him to instinctively analyze and evaluate any element.
But Yuri does not intend to use this power to fight. He who only wants a quiet life far from conflicts, he then takes a big decision: he will use his power to become a kitchen ace!

name: Kimi wa Kawaii Hito
nutshell: Migita, a handsome and popular student always uses the word 'cute' to describe everything. He thinks that the word 'cute' is simply that - a word. Sanai confronts him about this and their journey starts from there.

name: Judge
nutshell: Hiro's brother Atsuya is dating his childhood friend and secret crush Hikari. Hiro's affection for Hikari will lead him to commit an un-punishable crime against his older brother. At least, he thinks it is un-punishable, until he is kidnapped and imprisoned by a group of people wearing animal masks. The judging is about to start!

name: I Accept You
nutshell:
Yee Su-yoon is a high school student who has everything going for him – top of his class, top fighter and a Barbie-like girlfriend named Kang Ha-eun.
But why does he mistreat his girlfriend and seem to always protect a girl named Chae Shin-hee?

name: Neon Genesis Evangelion - A lovey-dovey fanfic about Evangelion's Asuka and a slightly grown-up Shinji-kun (Doujinshi)
nutshell: An asushin short made by the manga by nagatoro.

name: First Breakfast
nutshell:
BL, baguette and love story.
Author's Twitter

name: Iron Horse
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
A collection of short stories by master storyteller Mikiya Mochizuki! Tetsuma is traveling in search of his mother while kidnapping the princess of the Kingdom of Shizoka.
The reason was that Tetsuma was separated from his mother when he was three years old and the princess knew his face. Pursued and cornered by knights, Tetsuma enters a place where demons live...!?

name: Zankoku Yuugi
nutshell:
Story 1: Suou Hatasu is a nice guy with a pretty normal life. Like most college students, he's living alone in a little shoebox apartment and commutes on-foot. In spite of his financial limitations, he's fairly satified with his life: he's got a good friend, a cute girlfriend and is just starting his first student-teaching job at an area high school.
Things only seem to be getting better for him when one of his students, handsome and fabulously wealthy Harashima Daichi, seems to take a shine to him. Immediately feeling welcomed to his new school, Suou couldn't really ask for more. Until his new "buddy" Harashima suddenly turns on him in a deserted hallway and vows to make Suou "his property".
Can money really buy love? Harashima certainly seems to think so…
Story 2: Three childhood friends, Yoshito, Sei and Daisuke, come to a crossroads in their relationship when Yoshito announces he's getting married. Sei's composure crumbles and he admits to having loved Yoshito since Middle School. But while Sei's been chasing after Yoshito, he's been too preoccupied to notice that Daisuke's been chasing after him.

name: Junketsu no Maria Exhibition
nutshell: This manga tells parts of the story that are not included in the main Junketsu no Maria manga. It once again features the witch Maria, who lives in France during the Hundred Years War in France. The manga begins with the meeting of Viv, who is an English witch, and Maria.

name: Yuyushiki Anthology Comic
nutshell: Anthology by various artists.

name: Zenmaijikake no Tina
nutshell:
Tina Tia Lilu is a helpful and sweet girl from Wind Up Village on Wind Up Island. When she and her friends find a boy inside a waterfall, Tina discovers that the "mysterious traveler" is not like her.
But strange things are happening around her. Dr. Weirdlaff and his cronies are up to something, and Tina tries to understand her strange feelings toward the boy who came down from the rainbow as an adventure she never expected unfolds.

name: Ratsuwan Shachou no Hiru to Yoru
nutshell: Consists of a collection of oneshots.

name: Will sama wa kyou mo mahou de asondeimasu .
nutshell:
Willbell is the three-year-old son of the Torkis household, in the kingdom of Philphilia. And, as it turns out, a magic prodigy.
Web Novel
Author's Twitter

name: Oh My Ghost
tags: Action,Ghosts,Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Adventure,User Created,Magic,School Life,Horror,Fantasy,Monster Girls,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Supernatural,Full Color,Tragedy
nutshell: Have you heard a ghost who is afraid of scary stuffs like darkness, horror movies, ghosts, and etc? and loves to eat sweets? Yup you read it right…. This Ghost can eat. Logic is useless here in this series.

name: Jibun no Mune ni Kiitemina
nutshell: Tsubaragi, who is a kind and a thoughtful guy, is dating five girls at the same time. The reason is that he doesn't want to see girls being sad because of rejection. But is this situation sustainable in the long run?

name: Tales from the Land of Daughters - ShengNan's Story
nutshell: In the Woman Country, the respectful NanBei has decreed that only men of aristocratic backgrounds are to be allowed to marry and those of low status are to be sold as slaves to fulfill the whims of women. ShenNan is an ordinary modern day middle school student, but the fact is she's anything but, as a haunted incident at school allows her to pass through to the Woman Country where she experiences the monarch life of few illustrious old gentlemen.

name: Debby the Corsifa wa Makezugirai
nutshell:
"I know! I'll destroy some humans to kill time!"
The strongest demon ever makes an unexpected appearance! But she's… a total airhead?! A comedy about a clumsy but emulous demon trying to kill time begins!

name: Hollabook Girl
nutshell: Projetando uma estante personalizada para o cara mais gostoso da cidade?! Entrando em sua residência particular à vontade?! Se sua legião de fãs descobrisse isso, eles provavelmente morreriam de ciúmes... nem li livros! Ele só a contratou para ler seus roteiros! Com licença

name: The Red Claw
nutshell: Zengouku, a dark demon who always lust for destroying the human world, had murdered Natsuki's parents to usurp "The Four Gods Treasure", as known as the most powerful and dangerous weapon. However, many things had happened that made the power inside the treasure exhausted and dispersed. To kill the immortal demon, Natsuki and her comrades have to look for the four gods in order to recover the lost power of the treasure, without knowing one of them is actually Zengouku's spy.

name: Love Me Doctor!
nutshell: Kang Hyuk, whose sexual function doesn't work properly at a young age due to the pressure to satisfy his girlfriend. Eventually, he goes to visit an urologist. There he meets bone-gay doctor Han Yu-jun, so-called "Godhand" of the urology world.

name: The Color of Your Lips
nutshell:
In this colourful world, I lost all of my colours…
Then the boy shining in gold arrives to change it?
Touching new series by Iwashita Keiko begins now!
[PL] W tym kolorowym świecie straciłam wszystkie swoje kolory. Czy chłopiec w złocie, który się pojawił, to zmieni?

name: Ichiban Itazuki
nutshell:
Ichiban Itazuki
Kusogami-jima
Fushi no Sake
Kaettekita Otoko
Osorubeki Rival
Umeboshi
Majo Hanako
Kage Onna
Hoshi wo Ayatsuru Otoko
Ame Onna
Ippai no Coffee kara

name: Hey <YEAH!＞
nutshell:
Live with the company and die with the company.
Kato, a new employee who devotes himself to the company with the spirit of Bushido. Gen James Yorikazu, who is in the same generation, sneers at the spirit of loyalty and lives irresponsibly.
1991, when the bubble economy burst. Yoshihiro Yamada of "Heugemono" depicts a NEO office worker gag manga of the same generation as those who entered the bubble economy.

name: Crossdressing Boy and Valentine's Day
nutshell: Creator-approved translations by Hachirumi Scans

name: Nijiiro☆Prism Girl
nutshell:
The beautiful and tall Kohinata Nijika, a 6th grader kid who doesn't even look like her age and daughter of an office chief of a tv station, avoids the entertainment world when her mom, a legendary actress, died from a sickness. Hiding the truth about her family, Nijika keeps another secret. The fact that she's living with the prince-like new actor, Ichinose Touya, may create a ruckus if this will be discovered.
Running for another errand, Nijika, together with her pet Kapitama-kun, coincidentally runs into a drama set that's lacking an actress due to food poisoning. She volunteers for the role and…

name: Brilliant na Mahou
nutshell: Mitsuki's a high school freshman worried about her looks–or, at least, her "baby face". Until, that is, she enlists a little help from classmate Atsuki and her makeup kit. When Atsuki's finished, the transformation is complete–and breathtaking. It's also when the romantic adventures begin–a roller coaster ride of the heart that young and old are sure to enjoy.

name: Today's Onee♂Shota
tags: Romance,Comedy,Boys' Love,Incest,Crossdressing,Shota,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: Only publicly available (twitter/pixiv) comics will be translated and shared here. For the continuation of these stories -yes, they're R18- please visit the artist's FANBOX!

name: Idakarete Tamaru ka!
nutshell:
"Do you really mean it? Are you saying you're not feeling good when you're so wet?"
He's playing with all my sensitive parts, making my whole body melt. Is this what "cumming" feels like...?! I, Komari Kanata, a perfectionist, have a natural enemy. He's my colleague who always ranks number one in sales, Kiyose Higashimachi. I don't know if he's aware of my opinion of him, but he always picks fights with me. One day, he finds out about a secret of mine...!
"I can't stop myself when I see your troubled face."
When he strokes me inside with his long fingers... I can't! No matter how sweetly you touch me, you're the only one who I won't let embrace me!
A story about the stormy and heart-fluttering relationship between an unreadable man and a bluffing girl.

name: Kyouai Catastrophe
nutshell: The moment you fall in love, should that be considered as real love? I mean, all it is, really, is self satisfaction, isn't it? You aren't thinking about the other person's happiness, but rather, all you're thinking about is, "As long as I feel good, it's fine." To purge that sort of love, Thales plans to interfere between couples as much as possible, and then sever their ties.
